ComicInfo.Summary:
Spider-Man and Deadpool continue their epic adventure with Slapstick!
But with a literal cartoon fighting by his side (and Slapstick, too!) will Spidey be able to keep his promise to take his super heroing more seriously?
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|------------------------------------------|-------------------------------|------------------| | Reg | Regular Cover | Will Robson & Richard Isanove | 1 | | Var | Marvel vs. Capcom Infinite Variant Cover | Genzoman | 2 |
ComicInfo.Title: No Laughing Matter: Part Two
